DataElement.preferredName: Mesothelin Positive Outcome Central Laboratory Determination Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to questions which are necessary to allow clinical trial participation, as outlined in the study protocol, to address the establishment of mesothelin expression by a laboratory delivering the data for a particular study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Mesothelin Positive Outcome Central Laboratory Determine Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Indicates that mesothelin expression has been detected in a sample._The result of an action._A laboratory delivering the data for a particular study._The establishment of a state or result._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient is registered to t
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is registered to the randomized phase 2 part: Is Mesothelin screen positive as determined from archival tissue, performed centrally?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have positive mesothelin expression (Ventana MSLN-IHC; Negative=H-score less than or equal to 10)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is registered to the Phase 2 portion, does tissue submitted for testing at pre-registration show moderate or stronger mesothelin expression greater than or equal to 30% of the tumor cells?
